Html:
First of all - nice project!

The problem:

When i`m adding images to the section they go to the top of the page. No matter how through htmlconverter or $section->addImage( $src, $imageStyle );  images end up at the top of the exported file. Also the images are arranged backwards - LIFO (last-in, first-out). I will be thankful for any help.

P.S. I don`t use template file.
Sorry for delayed response - did you ever sort this out? I haven't been able to reproduce this problem.
Yes i sort the problem out. Actually the problem was because i was using LibreOffice (v3.5.0) to open the files. In MS Office the pictures and other elements appeared correctly!
